testcase.classname: feature to test google search functionality
testcase.name: Validate google search is working or not
testcase.system-out: Given Browser to open.......................................................passed And user is on google search page...........................................passed When user enters a textin search box........................................passed And Hits enter button.......................................................passed Then User is navigated to search results page...............................passed

testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid cridientials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed And Clicks on login buton...................................................passed Then user should navigated to the home page.................................passed
